alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 9:04PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Sweetwater County through 945 PM MDT... At 901 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles south of Superior, or 18 miles east of Rock Springs, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Rock Springs measured a 59 mph wind gust at 848 PM. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Sweetwater County, including the following locations... Southwest Wyoming Regional Airport, Point Of Rocks and Bitter Creek. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 113 and 143. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
